title: Did Thomas Edison’s Mother Lie About a Letter Expelling Him from School?
subtitle: A heartwarming anecdote tells of the future inventor's mother fibbing to her son about his expulsion from school due to “mental deficiencies."
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Thomas Edison’s mother lied about the contents of a letter from her son’s school informing her that the school had expelled him for “mental deficiencies.”
